trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Contient des styles de bordure pour les cellules dans un contrôle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> contrôle vous permet de personnaliser son apparence, y compris les bordures des cellules et des en-têtes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> propriétés qui vous permettent de définir l’apparence de la bordure de cellule.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, si vous avez besoin personnaliser davantage les bordures, les <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> classe vous permet de définir le style de la bordure sur les côtés individuels des cellules.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> propriétés de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> représentent de la gauche, droite, haut et bordure inférieure d’une cellule, respectivement.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir ces propriétés sur le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> propriétés de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> pour créer plusieurs apparences pour les bordures séparant les cellules.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adjusts the cell borders of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> so that a double border separates the interior cells and the top left header cell from the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant ajuste les bordures de cellule d’un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> afin qu’une bordure double sépare les cellules intérieures et la cellule d’en-tête supérieure gauche des en-têtes de ligne et de colonne.

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple montre comment substituer la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> méthodes et le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> propriété.

trans-unit.source: These members use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objects to modify individual cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Ces membres utilisent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objets pour modifier les bordures de cellules individuelles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant illustre l’utilisation de ce constructeur.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple fait partie d’un exemple plus complet disponible dans le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> vue d’ensemble de la classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit le style de bordure pour toutes les bordures d'une cellule.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: Si le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> propriétés ne sont pas définies sur le même <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> valeur, le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> valeur de propriété est <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: La valeur spécifiée lors de la définition de cette propriété n'est pas une valeur <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> valide.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur spécifiée lors de la définition de cette propriété est <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance was retrieved through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: La valeur spécifiée lors de la définition de cette propriété est <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> et cette instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> a été récupérée via la propriété <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit le style pour la bordure inférieure d'une cellule.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> à comparer.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Détermine si l'objet spécifié est égal au <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> en cours.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> and the values for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> properties are equal to their counterpart in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="other" /> est un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> et les valeurs des propriétés <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" /> et <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> sont égales à leur équivalent dans le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> actuel ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.target: La valeur spécifiée lors de la définition de cette propriété est <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" /> et cette instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> a un contrôle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associé, doté d'une valeur de propriété <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> égale à <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ce membre est une implémentation d'un membre d'interface explicite.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il peut uniquement être utilisé lorsque l'instance de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> est castée en interface <xref:System.ICloneable>.

trans-unit.target: Retourne une chaîne qui représente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.target: Chaîne qui représente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> méthode retourne une chaîne qui inclut les valeurs pour le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> propriétés.
